title: Rinna Keibu wa Iki ga dekinai EX
description:
A series of romantic comedy doujinshi that focuses on Rinna, the 17-year-old ace police captain, and Meishi, a goofy but gentlemanly detective. These can be viewed on their own, but it's enjoyed more when combined with the published work of the same name.

[*][url=https://twitter.com/arrg15ayn]Author's Twitter[/url]
[*][url=https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/41066]Author's Pixiv[/url]

You can buy the books on [url=https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=327358]Melonbooks[/url], [url=https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/app/catalog/list?charaId=CHAR000000027824]Toranoana[/url], Amazon Japan (eBook only), and Bookwalker (eBook only).
